title: Samsung Galaxy Book 2 Business vs MacBook Air: Which one to buy?
content:
The Samsung Galaxy Book 2 Business is now official and it brings a lot of interesting specs and features to the table. It’s powered by Intel’s new 12th gen Alder Lake mobile processors and features a 14-inch Full HD display and a 1080p webcam. It’s shaping to be one of the best business notebooks out

The post Samsung Galaxy Book 2 Business vs MacBook Air: Which one to buy? appeared first on XDA.
description: In this article, we're going to take a look at the Samsung Galaxy Book 2 Business vs MacBook Air comparison to find out which one's better.
